title: SECTION 8 ACCEPTED!3 BED / 3 BTH 614  HOUSE FOR RENT!
posting_body: ** currently under construction, more pics to come **
Beautifully rehabbed 3BD/3 BATH single family home .Living room and dining room have wainscoting leading into the kitchen.
The bathrooms has been completely remodeled with all new fixtures, and ceramic tile.
Good size bedrooms, fit full/queen size beds.
Central heat & a/c. Resident pays gas, electric, water, garbage, grass, & snow.
Being in such a great location, you are only minutes to the beach, Market Commons, delicious restaurants, shops, and so much more!MUST SEE!
FOR SECTION 8 - ONLY A 4 BEDROOM VOUCHER WILL BE CONSIDERED, COOK COUNTY (HACC) MOVING PAPERS IN HAND.CALL:☎️
